It's because of this code:

noise = input.data.new().byte().resize_(input.size())
noise.bernoulli_(p)

which fails for cuda inputs because torch.cuda.ByteTensor doesn't have bernoulli_ impl at the moment (at least fails on my installation).

body:
It's because of [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/6626881e7a9d430bd37bd67057ba74b6669a7ccf/torch/nn/functional.py#L420-L421) code:
```python
noise = input.data.new().byte().resize_(input.size())
noise.bernoulli_(p)
```
which fails for cuda inputs because `torch.cuda.ByteTensor` doesn't have `bernoulli_` impl at the moment (at least fails on my installation).
